column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of my favorite places to eat in the city! I have not been here for a few years
column2: but again it did not disappoint! Great for groups
column3: as there is something for everyone. The sangria is a must and is soooo good. We all ordered one dish and then ate it and then took another round of different dishes. Everything was delicious ans some of the favorites were the goat cheese marinara
column6: dates and the sausages. Excellent service and we were all stuffed for only $30 per person.
